title: Euromillions results live - winning Lottery numbers for Friday, October 18
text:
Tonight's Euromillions jackpot, 10 days after a UK ticketholder scooped £170m, is £32m.

That's not to be sniffed at though, as it's still more than the UK National Lottery jackpot which sits at just £3.8m

Tonight we'll bring you the results of the Euromillions draw as soon as it's made.

The numbers usually come out around 8.20pm and we'll also get a video of the draw around 8.40pm.

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

Scroll down the get the results and follow the action in real-time.

There will also be the Thunderball draw at 8.15pm which gives you the chance to win £500,000.

Stick with us if you want to get the winning numbers before anyone else.

You still have until 7.30pm to get a ticket for tonight's draw and take a chance at becoming a millionaire yourself.

On with tonight's draw - get those tickets to hand. And good luck!

Update: Tonight’s National Lottery Euromillions winning numbers are: 18, 22, 42, 41, 08 and the Lucky Stars are: 11, 12.
description: The National Lottery Euromillions draw will be made this evening and £32m is up for grabs.
